text.content: Bringing Woship Projection software to every part of the world
Free and works directly from your browser 👏
Worship assistant runs directly on your browser meaning you can get started right away and it can run on any device!
Easily search across your songs, their lyrics and bible verses. Allow your worship team to freely jump from song to song, even if it isn't pre-loaded into the service
Great for home churches and smaller groups
Connect directly to your TV by using Google Cast from your browser

A revolutionary approach to organizing your service
A fresh way of laying out your service allows you to present content horizontally enabling. No more stress when the worship team jumps from song to song!
There's a lot of reasons to get started

⭐ Works offline
⭐ Support the platform for other communities
⭐ Theme management
⭐ CCLI support
